DOC.brief_summary: Molecular gene profiling of fine-needle aspiration samples in addition to fine-needle aspiration cytology can improve the selection of patients with benign versus malignant thyroid nodules with improved sensitivity.
DOC.brief_title: Improved Preoperative Selection of Cold Thyroid Nodules
DOC.criteria: Solitary thyroid nodules that appear solid on ultrasound and cold on a scintiscan Pregnancy and lactation Age below 20 years
DOC.keyword: Solitary solid and scintigraphically cold thyroid nodules
